com.netflix.florida.identity
Interface IFloridaInstanceFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
CassandraInstanceFactory
public interface IFloridaInstanceFactory

Interface for managing Dynomite instance data. Provides functionality to register, update, delete or list instances from the registry

Method Summary
 void attachVolumes(FloridaInstance instance, java.lang.String mountPath, java.lang.String device)
          Attach volumes if required

          Create/Register an instance of the server with its info.
 void delete(FloridaInstance inst)
          Delete the server node from the registry

          Return a list of all Dynomite server nodes registered.

          Return the Dynomite server node with the given id.

          Sort the list by instance ID
 void update(FloridaInstance inst)
          Update the details of the server node in registry
